QuestData.Title: Kypari Zar
QuestData.Description: What is that tree on the hill to the west? Can it be... Kypari Zar?$B$B<Korven the Prime lapses into silence.>$B$BWhen I returned from my final ravage, before being elevated to a paragon, I was given the honor of planting that very tree.$B$BI see it has grown into a great kypari, but... it seems something is amiss.$B$BThere is an old sonar tower at the base of the tree. Take me there, Wakener. I can use the tower to take a closer look.
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the Sonar Tower, then defend Korven the Prime as he examines the tree.
QuestData.CompletionText: What has happened to our home? Things feel amiss.
QuestData.RewardText: Once, great rivers of amber coursed through this tree's veins. Now, it is but a dried husk.
